page.title: 02Rangemore District Housing
page.content: The most concentrated area of housing is in{Rangemore}village. Some 50 houses of varying types are in {Chapel Lane}and{Tatenhill Lane.}Most of these are{cottages}belonging to Lord Burtons estate and are over 100 years old. The oldest house in the village is the{village shop}which is more than 200 years old. There are 6{council houses}built between 1950 and 1955, and opposite them 6{private houses}built in 1977. There is a{vicarage}and a{school {house. About 30 more houses are scattered around{Tatenhill Common.}These too were built originally for the estate workmen. The remaining houses are on the farms scattered throughout the block.
